narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lee Memorial Health System is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Ft Myers, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $97.8M in Medicaid payments across 2.3M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $97.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
